name: Miner Mania
description:
WARNING
Due to a completely human error, part of the OST was uploaded instead of the game iteslf. While this is fixed please download the GAME from here. I apologyze :(

OBJECT OF THE GAME/GAME DESCRIPTION

One day Cherry wanted to purchase a beautiful necklace, but it was too expensive.
She decided to head down to a mine, so she could make her own out of diamonds. But what she didn't expect was to find, miner mice!!
Cherry, the hero of this story (probably) will be able to succeed her dream, but she won't without your help.
You are Cherry! It's up to you to get the most diamonds down at the mines and run from the evil hands of the miner mice!
